projects.title: Stock Analytics Widget
projects.shortDescription: Fancy graphs that make losing money look scientific
projects.description: A stock analysis tool with more buttons and charts than I know what to do with. Features Monte Carlo simulations because apparently regular mistakes weren't random enough. Helps you lose money with confidence and statistical backing.

projects.title: Monte Carlo Particle Simulation
projects.shortDescription: My attempt to make chemistry look like a screensaver
projects.description: 3D particle simulation that bounces dots around the screen while pretending to do actual science. Uses the Metropolis algorithm, which sounds way more impressive than it actually is. Perfect for when you want to feel smart about physics you half-remember from college.

projects.title: LA Traffic Collisions Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: 620K collision records proving what every LA driver already knows: traffic here is a nightmare
projects.description: An interactive dashboard that turns 12 years of LAPD collision data into beautiful, depressing visualizations. Features a map that progressively loads 620K+ collision records so you can zoom into your neighborhood and realize you should probably take a different route to work. Includes temporal analysis showing that 5pm is indeed the worst time to be on LA roads, as if you needed data to tell you that.

projects.title: Dodgers Win Deal Notifier
projects.shortDescription: The most important public service I've ever provided
projects.description: Dodgers win at home? $6 meal deal at Panda Express. Dodgers throw 7 or more strikeouts? FREE Jumbo Jack at Jack in the Box (with purchase of a large drink). This is literally the only sports betting tip that actually matters. Sign up to get notified when your local fast food joints turn on the free food faucet.

projects.title: Public Art Submission Form
projects.shortDescription: For when you see something cool and want to help me with a personal project.
projects.description: A mobile-friendly form that lets you document street art, murals, and other cool stuff you find while wandering around. Takes your photo, grabs your location, and hopefully doesn't crash your phone. Also help me collect data for my public art map project.

projects.title: Street Art Hunter App
projects.shortDescription: For when you see something cool and want to help me with a personal project.
projects.description: A mobile-friendly app that lets you document street art, murals, and other cool stuff you find while wandering around. Takes your photo, grabs your location, and hopefully doesn't crash your phone. Also help me collect data for my public art map project.

projects.title: Traffic Therapy
projects.shortDescription: A sliding block puzzle game that's basically Rush Hour but in space
projects.description: A Rush Hour-style sliding block puzzle game with 5 hand-crafted levels, a BFS solver that verifies every puzzle is solvable, and a hidden level editor for when you want to make your friends suffer. Pure vanilla JS, no frameworks, no build tools, just vibes and pointer events.

projects.title: Ebay Lookup Chrome Extension for Craigslist
projects.shortDescription: A Chrome extension that allows you to search eBay for items listed on Craigslist
projects.description: A Chrome extension that allows you to search eBay for items listed on Craigslist. It's a simple extension that allows you to search eBay for items listed on Craigslist. It's a simple extension that allows you to search eBay for items listed on Craigslist.
